original_title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
overview: The women of India have always accepted men the way they are, but this one woman is full of ego and pride and because of this she doubts her husband's character and comes across a crooked pervert man who because of his lust spoils innocent girls.
title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
